title: Leaverbuster

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body: My game has crashed completely randomly while in game for the past seven months... its to the point that i need to sign out of my computer all together in order to get back in the game. Just right now i have got this leaver buster telling me i need to sign saying i will not leave any further games even if unintentional. I think this is completely irrational given the fact that i've tried the client fixer, reinstall, scanned my computer multiple times. This crash happens to other people too and its not an ordinary bugsplat. I have written plenty of tickets etc. but no one from riot has gotten back to me... someone help or my account will probably be banned for something out of my control.
